title: Trump loses appeal and must pay E Jean Carroll $83m in defamation case – live
summary: A federal appeals court has upheld a defamation judgment against Donald Trump, dismissing his administration's claim of immunity based on a Supreme Court ruling. The court's decision reinforces the legal consequences of Trump's statements. This ruling could set a precedent for future defamation cases involving public officials.

title: New home secretary Shabana Mahmood says she will not run for deputy leader after Labour accused of ‘stitch-up’ over contest – UK politics live
summary: Wes Streeting and Jess Phillips have both decided not to run for leadership amid reports that Emily Thornberry is looking for support. Potential candidates must secure 80 backing signatures by 5 PM on Thursday. The race for leadership is heating up as the deadline approaches.

title: At least 19 killed in ‘gen Z’ protests against Nepal’s social media ban
summary: Demonstrators are protesting against widespread corruption and nepotism that they claim is pervasive in their country. Their grievances reflect a growing frustration with governance and a demand for accountability. The protests signify a broader call for reform and justice from the authorities.

title: Europe live: Macron labelled ‘a defeated president’ as his PM faces no-confidence vote
summary: Socialist leader Boris Vallaud fiercely criticized President Macron, labeling the decision by François Bayrou to initiate a no-confidence vote as a "cop-out." Vallaud's remarks underscore the ongoing political tensions in France. The statement highlights divisions among political figures regarding accountability and governance.

title: Surrey all out for 246, Durham’s McKinney hits century at Essex: county cricket day one – live
summary: Tanya Aldred provides live updates from day one of the County Championship as it resumes after a month-long hiatus. Fans can expect coverage of match highlights and key performances. Keep an eye on the latest developments from the grounds throughout the day.
